project.name: XApi - Jre Reflection and Classpath Scanning
project.description:
This module contains a classpath scanner, and bytecode reader.
It is useful in any java runtime environment, and allows java code to parse bytecode into a meta structure of classes, annotations, methods and fields.
This meta structure is used throughout xapi to allow us to extend java structures in a cross-platform compliant way (exposing services and service objects so you can hack support for whatever runtime you need).
It is especially useful for fast runtime injection, and as an extensible structure during codegen (which exposes mutable interfaces for our meta structure)
